About Me

Discover My Core Strengths

NOTE!

This webpage serves as an experimental platform to demonstrate the implementation of accessibility features within web design. While it does not represent my official portfolio, it has been created in a portfolio-like format for experimental purposes. Its primary aim is to explore the impact of Sass and JavaScript modifications on accessibility and devise strategies to address and rectify these issues.

Original model for this page was presented at Brad Traversy Modern portfolio github -project .

Competent Accessibility Specialist

Practical mind with technical skills

I possess in-depth understanding of WCAG criteria, accessibility legislation, and HTML standards. With ease, I implement these principles into web development projects, ensuring inclusive digital experiences, drawing from insights gained in my master's theses in Educational Sciences (special needs education) and Sciences (educational technology).

Passionate interest in UX

Learning from the users

As someone deeply invested in User Experience (UX), with a strong emphasis on accessibility, I prioritize creating interfaces that are intuitive, efficient, and enjoyable for users of all abilities. By understanding different needs and behaviors, I strive to design experiences that seamlessly align with their expectations, fostering engagement and satisfaction.

Inspiring educator

Excited about fostering growth and curiosity

As an educator in my professional domain, I'm committed to nurturing growth and curiosity among customers and colleagues alike. Through sharing knowledge and fostering collaboration, I empower individuals to develop skills, explore new ideas, and drive innovation.
